i really don't know what has 
happened to me today i feel so tired

can you believe 20 minutes ago i was lying 
on the bed asleep having a beautiful dream

something really nice was happening to 
me then suddenly i woke up with a start

that means with a shock or a jump and i realized 
that i was supposed to be on doing a live stream

at two o'clock so i rushed up the 
stairs i dashed into the studio

no i rushed down the stairs you see can you see 
what a terrible state i am in today i don't know

what's happening my brain is only half working 
at the moment i don't know why but look outside

look at the weather it's quite miserable it's dull 
it's dismal we've had quite a lot of rain today

and everything is looking a little bit 
gloomy here we go we're back together again

and it is english addict with a very 
sleepy mr duncan coming to you live

from the birthplace of the english 
language which just happens to be
england

what a lovely dream i was having 
i was on a beautiful island

the sun was shining in front of me a cool 
refreshing drink and the the gentle breeze

from the sea was blowing past my face oh very

a complete dream it was also a little bit of a

are you okay i hope so are you happy i hope so

do you ever have a day like this where you wake up 
in the morning and it seems as if you can't wake

up and i'm having that day now i think yesterday 
what happened i actually burned myself out

i think i burnt myself out yesterday because i 
was so energetic on yesterday's live stream did

you see it i think yesterday's live stream must 
have been one of the most lively and dare i say

funny can i say funny was it funny do 
you think it was funny yesterday but

it was something anyway and i think 
i used so much energy up yesterday

i've i've literally burnt myself out my brain

that is what my brain looks like 
at the moment it certainly feels

like it here we go yes we are back together again 
my name is duncan i'm not normally this sleepy

normally i'm very lively and awake but today 
it really does feel as if i've had no sleep

how is that possible i had a lovely sleep last

i did mention yesterday that i do like to go and

but today i don't know what's 
happened i think yesterday i just

i just used all of my energy and mr steve 
yesterday was a little bit crazy as well

if you haven't seen yesterday's 
live stream with myself and steve
it was a little different let's just say

here we are then yes it's a start of another 
week my name is duncan i talk about english

you might say that i am an english addict 
i do like english and i've been doing

these lessons these videos these live streams 
for a very long time can you guess how long

it says it there on the top of my hat 15 
years goodness me yes we've made it all

the way to the beginning of another week 
without blowing ourselves up it's monday

do you know what this reminds me of 
it reminds me of when i was at school

and i don't know why but i hated the afternoon 
i always hated the afternoon in the classroom

at school so afternoon lessons and i 
don't know why but they always gave us

boring lessons in the afternoon which 
only made us feel even more sleepy

but i remember i i hated sitting in the classroom 
in the afternoon because not only myself but other

people in the class would also become sleepy 
and it was very hard to keep your head upright

and now and again it would look like that you 
would just slump onto the desk and you hoped

that the teacher didn't notice that you were 
closing your eyes during his lesson or her lesson

and that's how i feel today i feel as if i'm 
back in my mathematics class with mr west

and i'm finding it so difficult to 
pay attention and keep my eyes open

during the lesson and sometimes he would shout 
at me he would point his finger at me and scold

me for not paying attention but that was pretty 
pretty usual for me you see i was not very good

at paying attention in the classrooms at school 
all of my classes the only class i really enjoyed

well in fact maybe two two classes that i 
enjoyed at school art which i loved i had

the most amazing art teacher mr stevenson he was 
such a brilliant guy and english i supposed i i

yes i enjoyed my english class as well with miss 
miss ryder she was all right as well and science

so maybe three i enjoyed science as well 
that was quite good i wasn't very good at it

but i did enjoy it some people say mr duncan your 
english teaching is very similar to that you enjoy

it but you're not very good at it charming so 
here we are again yes we are back with our special

with my english addict quick fix just short live

streams as a way of commemorating my 15 years on 
youtube so you can catch me live from 2pm uk time

from monday to friday and of course sunday

so this week i've decided to make it a little bit

i was more upset about my lovely iced lolly
